definition: to be willing to do sth/to be ready to do sth/to be happy to do sth/content/satisfied
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

sentences.english: The LORD finds us enough reasons for prayer, and we ought to thank Him that it is so.
sentences.chinese: 上帝樂意聽我們的瑣碎絮語，我們也該爲此獻上感謝。

sentences.english: Now you can drop the subscripts if you prefer.
sentences.chinese: 現在如果你樂意，可以去掉下標。

sentences.english: But he is proud to show off the scars and stitch-marks that cover his belly.
sentences.chinese: 但他卻很樂意炫耀自己肚子上的刀疤和縫合的印記。

sentences.english: As a monitor, Bo Shi Wa is ready to help others.
sentences.chinese: 作爲班長，博士蛙樂意幫助別人。

sentences.english: That mous actor seemed content to play a minor part in the play.
sentences.chinese: 那位名演員似乎很樂意在劇中扮演一個次要角色。

sentences.english: Weidong will be very glad to meet you and Mary.
sentences.chinese: 衛東非常樂意認識你和瑪麗。

sentences.english: If you like, you can also dismember them.
sentences.chinese: 如果玩者樂意的話，還可以肢解受害者的屍體。

sentences.english: I also want to be a part of the conversations Googlers are having in the hallways.
sentences.chinese: 當然我也很樂意成爲員工在走廊裏談話裏的一部分。

sentences.english: Yes, if it wouldn''t take too long to arrange.
sentences.chinese: 若不會花太多時間安排的話我很樂意。

sentences.english: However, they can always give a suprise to those who are willing to do and help.
sentences.chinese: 但它總是能給予樂意行動和支付的人以驚喜。

sentences.english: I will gladly share more details if you have questions or clarifications.
sentences.chinese: 我會很樂意分享更多的細節，如果您有問題或澄清。

sentences.english: Countries which prefer to rely on America are happy to maintain the pretense.
sentences.chinese: 而傾向依賴於美國的國家也樂意保持這種虛假。

sentences.english: True to form, Finnie is much more interested in talking about her students.
sentences.chinese: 範尼還是一如既往地更樂意談論她的學生們。

sentences.english: I would be happy to expedite and issue his U.S. visa myself.
sentences.chinese: 我本人將非常樂意加快簽發他的美國簽證。

sentences.english: Importer: Yes, if it wouldn't take too long to arrange.
sentences.chinese: 若不會花太多時間安排的話我很樂意。

sentences.english: I am sure Lizzy will be very happy -- I am sure she can have no objection.
sentences.chinese: 我相信麗萃也很樂意的，我相信她還會反對。

definition: happy/glad/willing (to do sth)/in a cheerful mood
to feel happy/to rejoice/to have a great time/to make fun of sb
to approve of/to endorse/to acknowledge/to recognize/to identify oneself with
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
willing (to do sth)/to take pleasure in
to take the initiative/to do sth of one's own accord/spontaneous/active/opposite: passive 被動|被动[bei4 dong4]/drive (of gears and shafts etc)
to be concerned about/to care about
improbable/unlikely/will not (act, happen etc)/not able/not having learned to do sth/(coll.) (Tw) don't mention it/not at all
